feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Find Maintenance Orders
entry.content: Does anyone know what the specific criteria for the search fields "Outstanding Purchasing", "Outstanding Reservations" and "Outstanding Services" to be marked "Yes" are? Seems straight forward but when we test it we see inconsistent results

entry.content:
Merge activation is pending and you would like to know how to Complete or Cancel a Staging?

entry.title: Finding APIs to implement the goods movement from the third-party warehouse to the S/4 Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hi,

We are looking for your advice on a solution for the goods movement from the third-party warehouse to the S/4 Public Cloud. We tried to find APIs, but had no luck.

 

Best regards

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud: Issue with Default "Tax Calculation Brazil" in Customer BP Master Data
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I'm currently engaged in an SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud implementation project for a client in South Korea.

Problem Description: While setting up Business Partner (BP) master data, specifically for the Customer (Fin. Accounting) BP Role, I've noticed an anomaly. On the Customer: Tax Data tab, there's an entry for "Tax Calculation Brazil" that shouldn't be there. [I want to set it as "Tax Calculation: South Korea" instead]. Our project is entirely focused on South Korea, and no Central Business Configuration (CBC) settings related to Brazil have been made for this project.

Goal: I need to remove/delete this "Tax Calculation Brazil" entry and ensure that only the relevant tax calculation settings for South Korea are present and applicable for this Business Partner.

Question: Could anyone advise on the best approach to resolve this? Is there a specific transaction, configuration step, or master data change process to delete such an incorrect tax entry from a Business Partner, or to reset the tax data section?

Your expertise and insights would be extremely helpful. 

Thank you for your time and assistance,

Best regards,

entry.title: Plant Transfer via PO-SO Process Between GST-Registered Units Within Same Company Code
entry.content:
Dear Team,

There is a plant-to-plant transfer within the same company, involving two different GST registrations. The process must include entries from the Procurement, Sales, and Finance sides. We have already tried the STO and OTC processes; however, the requirement is to initiate the transfer through a Sales Order (SO) with reference to a Purchase Order (PO). How do I proceed with this scenario in SAP S4 Hana Public Cloud? 

Thanks in advance!

Vivek Paul D

entry.title: Doubts about using the API
entry.content:
We are posting invoices using the API_SUPPLIERINVOICE_PROCESS_SRV/A_SupplierInvoice API, but we have a question about how to post service items associated with condition types. We have reviewed all available documentation and don't see how this can be done. This must be done to provide a similar approach to posting planned indirect costs using the advanced supplier invoice creation application.
How should we proceed to post both goods and planned indirect costs on the same invoice using the API?

How can we post a logistics credit memo using this API?


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Cross-Company Code Cash Application – Withholding Tax Issue
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

We received the cash receipt/bank statement in company code DE01, but the invoice we are trying to apply the payment to was created in FR01. When attempting to apply the cash directly, we encounter a tax error stating:

"Company Codes have different settings for withholding tax treatment."

As a workaround, we currently follow this process:

  • We post the bank statement on account to company code FR01.
  • Then, we use the "Clear Incoming Payments – Manual Clearing" app to apply the cash to the customer invoice.                                                                                                                                              

This method works, but it involves manual steps. I’d like to explore whether there’s a more efficient or automated solution. Specifically:

Is there a configuration change or system adjustment that could eliminate the need for manual clearing?
Can the system be set up to allow direct application of cash across company codes with different tax settings?

Thanks

Naveen Kumar

entry.title: Able to create invoice (F2) for inactive tax code
entry.content:
Hello Team,

The tax code is deactivated in the config Img->Define Tax Codes for Sales and Purchases

Under properties tax code is set as inactive  

The following are our queries: 

Can you please explain how deactivation of tax code works?
How can we limit the creation of invoice for inactive tax code?
Can you please explain how deactivation of tax code works?

 

 

 

 

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: How to mass change technical objects in S4 Public cloud
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

Need suggestion how to perform Mass Change in Technical Objects (Equipment and Functional Location).

There is an App named Find Technical Object but it has restriction to select only 20 records at a time.

I am looking for a mass update, example for materials there is one app named Manage Mass Maintenance Products where we can actually update the whole master records by searching and selecting on Table Level and also it has provision to update associated class and characterstics.

 

Please let me know is there any way to do the same for technical objects, any help will be valuable.

 

Thanks

entry.title: Odata Create Material Document (S4 hana cloud public) error "content of order xxx, transferred.."
entry.content:
hi

context : we use the service API_MATERIAL_DOCUMENT_SRV from scenario Material Document Integration (SAP_COM_0108)

we want to create goods issue related to production order because we need to specify serial numbers used sometimes.

for now we juste try to create a simple material consumption with the following payload

<A_MaterialDocumentHeader>
	<A_MaterialDocumentHeaderType>
		<PostingDate>2025-08-19T20:00:00</PostingDate>
		<GoodsMovementCode>03</GoodsMovementCode>
		<CtrlPostgForExtWhseMgmtSyst>3</CtrlPostgForExtWhseMgmtSyst>
		<VersionForPrintingSlip>1</VersionForPrintingSlip>
		<to_MaterialDocumentItem>
			<A_MaterialDocumentItemType>
				<Material>PLAQNU_APS</Material>
				<Plant>3010</Plant>
				<StorageLocation>FR10</StorageLocation>
				<GoodsMovementType>261</GoodsMovementType>
				<MaterialDocumentItemText>TEST</MaterialDocumentItemText>
				<ManufacturingOrder>1000404</ManufacturingOrder>
				<ManufacturingOrderItem>1</ManufacturingOrderItem>
				<EWMWarehouse>110</EWMWarehouse>
				<EWMStorageBin>PROD-SUPPLY</EWMStorageBin>
				<GoodsMovementRefDocType>F</GoodsMovementRefDocType>
				<QuantityInEntryUnit>1.25</QuantityInEntryUnit>
				<EntryUnit>M2</EntryUnit>
				<Reservation>617</Reservation>
				<ReservationItem>1</ReservationItem>
			</A_MaterialDocumentItemType>
		</to_MaterialDocumentItem>
	</A_MaterialDocumentHeaderType>
</A_MaterialDocumentHeader>

but we get the error 

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<error xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/ado/2007/08/dataservices/metadata">
	<code>M7/349</code>
	<message xml:lang="en">Content of order 1000404: PLAQUS_APS transferred to interface (IMSEG): PLAQNU_APS</message>
	<innererror>
		<application>
			<component_id>MM-IM-VDM-SGM</component_id>
			<service_namespace>/SAP/</service_namespace>
			<service_id>API_MATERIAL_DOCUMENT_SRV</service_id>
			<service_version>0001</service_version>
		</application>
		<transactionid>f5956f988f884dc59fc90a5ee55b8cd0</transactionid>
		<timestamp>20250819105118.9045300</timestamp>
		<Error_Resolution>
			<SAP_Transaction>For backend administrators: use ADT feed reader "SAP Gateway Error Log" or run transaction /IWFND/ERROR_LOG on SAP Gateway hub system and search for entries with the timestamp above for more details</SAP_Transaction>
			<SAP_Note>See SAP Note 1797736 for error analysis (https://service.sap.com/sap/support/notes/1797736)</SAP_Note>
		</Error_Resolution>
		<errordetails>
			<errordetail>
				<ContentID/>
				<code>M7/349</code>
				<message>Content of order 1000404: PLAQUS_APS transferred to interface (IMSEG): PLAQNU_APS</message>
				<longtext_url>/sap/opu/odata/iwbep/message_text;o=LOCAL/T100_longtexts(MSGID='M7',MSGNO='349',MESSAGE_V1='1000404',MESSAGE_V2='PLAQUS_APS',MESSAGE_V3='PLAQNU_APS',MESSAGE_V4='')/$value</longtext_url>
				<propertyref/>
				<severity>error</severity>
				<target/>
				<transition>false</transition>
			</errordetail>
		</errordetails>
	</innererror>
</error>

we tried several options and fields without success. we had no problem to create a good receipt for the same production order, but the consumption of components is not working...

this is what our production order looks like when it is sent for manufacturing : 

<n0:ManufacturingOrderExecuteRequest_V2 xmlns:n0="http://sap.com/xi/SAPGlobal20/Global" xmlns:soap-env="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:prx="urn:sap.com:proxy:KLX:/1SAI/TAE785CF53A5441736BC90D:916" xmlns:n1="http://sap.com/xi/PP/Global2">
	<MessageHeader>
		<ID>FA163E0211241FE09F9CB919D4FCC91A</ID>
		<UUID>fa163e02-1124-1fe0-9f9c-b919d4fcc91a</UUID>
		<CreationDateTime>2025-08-19T10:18:00.875Z</CreationDateTime>
		<SenderBusinessSystemID>0M628UP</SenderBusinessSystemID>
	</MessageHeader>
	<ManufacturingOrder changeOrdinalNumberValue="1" reconciliationPeriodCounterValue="1">

		<ManufacturingOrderCategory>10</ManufacturingOrderCategory>
		<ManufacturingOrderType>YBM1</ManufacturingOrderType>

entry.title: changing the label count in the app Enter Time Ticket for Production Order (CO11N)
entry.content:
Hello SAP experts, 

in a S/4 HANA public cloud envorinment we have the following topic, Maybe one of you have an idea?:

Issue:
We want to able to change the label count of time ticket for production order.

Process:
In the app “Enter Time Ticket for Production Order(CO11N)”, with the production order and confirm type selected as “Final Confirmation”, time ticket is created and labels are starts printing.

Try outs:
We added a custom field to app to able able to enter label count(Screenshot2). We searched for a way to give that data to BADI’s.

CO11N is calling Migo in background and that we cannot pass the custom Label Field (Screenshot 1) to the standard label field and set the checkbox for the printing

We have looked for these BADI’s;

  • BD_WORKORDER_GOODSMOVT_BKF_GDR
  • FLOG_CHG_GR_DATA
  • MMIM_GR4XY_PROVIDE_DATA
  • MMIM_HEAD_PROVIDE_DATA

 

In some of these BADI’s we found “number of labels to be printed” in their importing parameters but we require it to be in their changing parameters.

entry.title: Workflow/Report for Customers with Non-Valid SEPA Mandate
entry.content:
Hi SAP-Community,

we are looking for a way to handle the following situation:
An automatic billing run creates invoices for customers whose SEPA mandate exists in the system but is not yet valid (for example because it hasn’t been signed). This could result in delayed payments.

Ideally, we would like to have a report or workflow that flags these cases so that the responible person can follow up with the customer in time.

Has anyone set up such a solution or found a standard way in SAP to cover this?

Thanks in advance!

Katharina

entry.title: PR quantity in PO
entry.content:
Hello dear experts,

After i created PO for partial quantity from PR, i need an option to close that PR quantity completely. So when i again create a PO for that same PR the remaining open Quantity should appear as 0 or even that item shouldn't appear in PO this has to be achieved without changing the PR quantity.

entry.title: In S4HANA Public Cloud is there any standard report from Sales order to Invoice
entry.content: In S4HANA Public Cloud is there any standard report available where I can have data of the Sales Full cycle from Sales Order to Invoice with qty price and taxes?

entry.title: Sales BOM: Is PGI for Both Parent and Child Components Possible in S/4HANA Cloud?
entry.content:
Dear Experts,


During delivery of sales BOM, client wants to do PGI for both parent and child component. Is that possible?


But we are unable to do PGI for child components, only possible to do parent component. Which is also not correct.


Kindly provide solution ASAP.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: 在eclipse中使用ADT插件做RAP开发报表使用https调用odata接口遇到报错"Selection is empty. Processing is canceled!"
entry.content:
Dear SAP expert,

我们在eclipse中使用ADT插件做RAP开发报表时，数据没有合适的CDS，但是有对应的API：API_MRP_MATERIALS_SRV_01/SupplyDemandItems ，此API在使用postman测试时加上参数（?$filter=Material eq '******' and MRPPlant eq '****' and PeriodType eq '*'）就能得到想要的数据，在RAP代码中使用https调用odata接口会遇到报错：Selection is empty. Processing is canceled! ， 这是因为接口没有读取到我设置的参数，无论是使用set_form_field还是使用set_query都无法设置有效的参数，是否还有其他设置参数的方法，或者有https的其他类可以使用。

代码：

DATA: http_client TYPE REF TO if_web_http_client,

lo_response TYPE REF TO if_web_http_response,

lv_url type string,

lv_usename type string,

lv_pwd type string.

 

" 通过 URL 启用通信

DATA(lo_url_destination) = cl_http_destination_provider=>create_by_url(

lv_url ).

 

" 获取 请求的 client

http_client = cl_web_http_client_manager=>create_by_http_destination( lo_url_destination ).

 

DATA(req) = http_client->get_http_request( ).

 

"设置账号密码

req->set_authorization_basic( i_username = lv_usename i_password = lv_pwd ).

"设置参数

req->set_form_field( i_name = 'Material' i_value = '00698-321/0000' ).

req->set_form_field( i_name = 'MRPPlant' i_value = '8900' ).

req->set_form_field( i_name = 'PeriodType' i_value = '2' ).

req->set_header_field( i_name = 'Accept' i_value = 'application/json' ).

"执行查询方法

lo_response = http_client->execute( if_web_http_client=>get ).

"获取返回数据 （报错：Selection is empty. Processing is canceled!）

DATA(lv_random_value) = lo_response->get_text( ).

 

DATA lt_response TYPE ty_response.

 

/ui2/cl_json=>deserialize(

EXPORTING json = lv_random_value

CHANGING data = lt_response )

 

Best regards,

Joey

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud : Setup Client ID/Secret, User ID and Password in Communication Arrangement
entry.content:
Hi Expert,

I am trying to implement the communication arrangement for a third-party REST API with their given user ID/password along with client ID and client secret. There is no as such IDP certificate from a third-party system that I can upload to Handshake with the SAP S/4HANA public cloud system. So I need to pass their user ID and password along with the client ID and secret. So my question is, where can I maintain these parameters, and how can I use it in SAP ABAP to establish the communication to call the REST API?

Note: When I do the same setup in Postman (with the user ID, password, client ID, and client secret), it generates the bearer token with one of the REST APIs, and I pass the generated bearer token to the second API call to send the data. I am trying to achieve similar functionality through communication arrangement and with ABAP code.

I highly appreciate the input and thank you in advance.

Regards,
Yasho.
